revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Delete empty text passage in first line, indication of page. According to P.Yale II 127 the upper margin is present. Line 4 add accent in |reg|. line 5: ὁμαρτῆι iota subscript; line 6: add [.?] at beginning (also in 7, 1-13, 18-19, 24), add accent in |reg|; line 7 not |ed| but <>; line 9 not |ed| but <>; line 10 not |ed| but <>; line 11 not |ed| but {}; line 13 no space after [.?].1, correct hyphen/line division; line 14 ῞Υδηι iota subscript, not |ed|, but <>; line 15 correct hyphen/line division; line 16 not -, but *dash*; line 17 not |reg|, but {}, correct hyphen/line division; line 18 omit (?) in |reg|; line 19 no |corr|, correct hyphen/line division; line 20 correct hyphen/line division; line 21 not |ed|, but \ /; line 22 not |reg|, but \ /, correct hyphen/line division; line 23 not |reg|, but \ /; line 24 not |ed|, but \ /; col. 2: in lines 2-6 and 9 add [.?] at line end; "page 2" needs to be completed with accents and corrected throughout; it should be part of the same column
Submit - Text entered from reference edition.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Delete empty text passage in first line, indication of page. According to P.Yale II 127 the upper margin is present. Line 4 add accent in |reg|. line 5: ὁμαρτῆι iota subscript; line 6: add [.?] at beginning (also in 7, 1-13, 18-19, 24), add accent in |reg|; line 7 not |ed| but <>; line 9 not |ed| but <>; line 10 not |ed| but <>; line 11 not |ed| but {}; line 13 no space after [.?].1, correct hyphen/line division; line 14 ῞Υδηι iota subscript, not |ed|, but <>; line 15 correct hyphen/line division; line 16 not -, but *dash*; line 17 not |reg|, but {}, correct hyphen/line division; line 18 omit (?) in |reg|; line 19 no |corr|, correct hyphen/line division; line 20 correct hyphen/line division; line 21 not |ed|, but \ /; line 22 not |reg|, but \ /, correct hyphen/line division; line 23 not |reg|, but \ /; line 24 not |ed|, but \ /; col. 2: in lines 2-6 and 9 add [.?] at line end; "page 2" needs to be completed with accents and corrected throughout; it should be part of the same column
Submit - Text entered from reference edition.

bibl.title: Studies in the Text and Transmission of the Iliad.
